I'll be slammed trying to catch up tomorrow.

With drops?

It's the least I can do.

translation.en: Right. Right. Good.
Good, great. Great, fantastic.
Well, I'll see you in the morning.

I'm not kidding. If you're not there, I'll fly without you.

I believe this is yours.
Yeah. Yes. Thank you.
Thank you. [clears throat]
Mary, before you go, have you heard from my son?

Not bad, city boy. Now I am back on schedule.

You keen?

translation.en: William, what the hell is going on?

translation.en: It's as if you've wandered off the face of the earth.

translation.en: The board is less than impressed.
Call me immediately.
No ball.
-Wide. -Dad!
It was a good game.
Yes, you've got a rather spirited fast ball, haven't you?

Listen, I've been… My father and me just…
-[cell phone ringing] -Sorry.
Look, I've got to take this.
-Is that all right? -Yeah. No worries.
[clears throat] Hello, D. Hi, Nikki.
[Duncan] William, the board meets in two days,

I feel like maybe I was too hasty.
Uh, check it out. Finally. Better late than never.

No, I wish, it's for the air con.
-At least that will make Will happy. -And my sweaty pits,

translation.en: -which is more important to me. -Fair enough.
I think maybe my assessment was off, and, um,

translation.en: upon review, I feel like there are unforeseen advantages

translation.en: Your assessment was off?
Yeah.
Do you really think I wouldn't have my team verify your figures?

translation.en: Your assessment was right on target.
A stiff breeze would knock the place over.

translation.en: What are you not telling me?
Well, you know, since I've been here on the ground and I've met the team,
translation.de: Seit ich hier bin und das Team kennengelernt habe,

translation.en: -Oh, bugger. -[Duncan] What have I always told you?

translation.en: Never let it become personal. It just makes it all the more difficult.

translation.en: I suppose now's your opportunity to learn that lesson.

Who the hell do you think you are?

translation.en: -Please let me explain. -Is this how you usually play it?

-"Worm my way in"? -Then you stab everyone in the back.

Okay. Don't make promises.
I heard that it pretty much sounds like a done deal.

-Can you just give me a second, please? -Give you a second?

translation.en: -Dana. -Guys.
-Can you hear me out? -I've heard you.

-Do you have any idea-- -Just leave!

translation.en: -[bangs] -Guys!
-Yes? -Cyclone. It's on the way.
-I'm sorry, what? -Oh, shit.
-What "Oh, shit"? -[siren blaring]
Where's Dad?
[Jeff] Let's go, everybody. Let's go. Gotta lock down.

translation.en: [voicemail] G'day. You've reached Jeff from Fullerton Airways.
translation.de: Guten Tag. Hier ist Jeff von Fullerton Airways.

translation.en: Just keep trying.
Nik, go grab what we need and get inside.

translation.en: -[Nikki] What are you gonna do? -I'm gonna go and find Dad.

[Dana] I'm coming, Dad.
Dana, hey, what can I do?
Step one, don't talk to me. Beyond that, I don't care.

translation.en: [shouts] Dad? Dad?
Dad? You in here?
Dad? Can you hear me?
Dad.
[Dana] Dad!
-You okay? -[groans in pain]
Dad.
Slowly, slowly.
That's it. Just go slowly, Jeff. Don't put pressure on it.

-Okay? -[Nikki] Help us move this.
-Here, here. Push. -[Nikki straining]
Thanks.
You're welcome.
Now, where were we?
Oh, yeah. Go to hell.
Whoa. [hesitates] What's that all about?
Oh. Oh, did you not tell him, Will?

translation.en: -Why don't you, uh, let Jeff know? -Look, I'm--

What? [straining]
No, Jeff.
Jeff, just relax. Look, I'll explain. Okay? I'll explain.

I'm sorry. All right? I'm sorry.

translation.en: -I should have said something. -You think?
The minute I get back to London, I'll recommend to the board

translation.en: -Give me a break. -I mean it.

Because of you!
Because I care about you.
I care about you.
It was just getting to the good bit.
I'll find some light. There's a lantern here somewhere. Oh, here we go.

You don't…
-You don't need to say anything. -[William] Dana…
I thought I always knew where I was going to end up, you know?

-[radio feedback] -[Nikki] Uh, testing, testing. Fullerton Airways radio check.

You know, you, um…

Having a flying partner these last few days, well,

To Fullerton Airways.

you kind of look like you could fit in here.

But the last thing she would have wanted was for it to become a burden for you.

translation.de: Aber ich glaube, er sicher kennt einen Weg,

translation.en: You really think this is gonna work?

[woman] Ladies and gentlemen, please remain seated with your seatbelts fastened.

translation.de: Fullerton Airways ist ein kleiner Betrieb

translation.en: on the other side of the world.
But what you won't believe
translation.de: Doch glauben Sie es oder nicht,

translation.en: is that we actually have something in common.
You see, we're both family businesses.
My mum and dad started ours when I was little and,
translation.de: Meine Eltern gründeten es, als ich klein war.

translation.en: well, I promised myself that I would always protect it,
translation.de: Und ich versprach mir, dass ich es immer beschütze.

translation.en: always keep it just the way that they made it.
translation.de: Dass ich es so erhalte, wie sie es geschaffen haben.

translation.en: The way that I always remembered it.
translation.de: So, wie ich mich daran erinnerte.

translation.en: You know what happened? I killed it.
translation.de: Und wissen Sie was? Ich versaute es.

translation.en: I think it might be better--
I killed it because I didn't want anything to change.
translation.de: Ich versaute es, weil ich keine Veränderungen wollte.

translation.en: You know, and sometimes we do need to accept
that the best way forward is to chart a different course.
translation.de: dass man den Kurs wechseln muss, um gut voranzukommen.

translation.en: Look I came here today with a proposal.
translation.de: Ich bin heute mit einem Vorschlag hier.

translation.en: We cannot stand still any longer.
The only way for Fullerton Airways to survive is to expand.
translation.de: Fullerton Airways kann nur überleben, wenn wir expandieren.

translation.en: We need to bring in more pilots, more planes.
translation.de: Wir brauchen mehr Piloten, mehr Flugzeuge.

translation.en: Here you go. This is yours. It's time to take the next step.
translation.de: Hier, bitte, für Sie. Zeit für den nächsten Schritt.

translation.en: In order to do that, we are going to need a new injection of capital.
translation.de: Um das zu tun, werden wir eine neue Kapitalspritze brauchen.

translation.en: Now, with your support, we'll be able to increase the coverage,
translation.de: Mit Ihrer Hilfe können wir die Reichweite erhöhen,

translation.en: almost triple the output within two years.
translation.de: in zwei Jahren verdreifachen wir die Leistung.

translation.en: We can take Fullerton Airways
from a struggling family operation to a thriving business,
translation.de: vom Familienbetrieb mit Problemen zum Erfolgsunternehmen,

translation.en: one that continues to serve the community in meaningful and essential ways.
translation.de: um der Gemeinde weiterhin auf bedeutende und entscheidende Weise zu helfen.

translation.en: So, I mean, what do you think?
I think this has gone on long enough.
Miss Randall, this is absurd. I'm familiar with your situation.
translation.de: Miss Randall, das ist absurd. Ich bin mit Ihrer Lage vertraut.

translation.en: Do you honestly expect us to throw more money into this disaster?
translation.de: Sollen wir wirklich mehr Geld für dieses Desaster verheizen?

translation.en: There's no indication you'll be able to manage something like this.
translation.de: Nichts deutet darauf hin, dass Sie so was managen können.

translation.en: What if they had a more experienced financial officer?
translation.de: Was, wenn sie einen erfahreneren Finanzchef hätten?

translation.en: What?
I'm resigning. Effective immediately.
I, uh… I'm gonna go and work for Fullerton Airways.
If they'll have me.
You must be joking.
No, I'm… I'm not.
But if you give me a chance to get this business on their feet,
translation.de: Doch wenn ich dem Geschäft auf die Sprünge helfen darf,

translation.en: I will show you that they do have legs.
translation.de: beweise ich, dass es laufen kann.

translation.en: Don't be ridiculous.
I mean, why in heaven's name would you want to throw away a career?
translation.de: Wieso in aller Welt willst du deine Karriere wegwerfen?

translation.en: Dad, you built this business. This was your dream.
translation.de: Dad… Dieses Unternehmen war dein Traum.

translation.en: Don't you remember how that felt?
To believe in something so badly that you had to see it done?
translation.de: So sehr an etwas zu glauben, dass man es verwirklichen muss.

translation.en: But, William--
Look, I… I only came here because I wanted to make you proud.
translation.de: -Aber William… -Hör zu. Ich bin nur hier, weil ich dich stolz machen wollte.

translation.en: I still want that.
But I… I don't belong here.
I'm just asking you to trust me.
translation.de: Ich bitte dich nur, mir zu vertrauen.

translation.en: Trust us.
Please.
You really think you can do this?
We can.
Together.
-Mary. -Yes, sir?
Send in Simon and the legal team. We have a proposal to review.
translation.de: Holen Sie Simon und das Anwaltsteam. Wir sehen was durch.

translation.en: Shall we?
You sure about this? I mean, it's not going to be easy.
translation.de: Bist du dir sicher? Das wird nicht einfach werden.

translation.en: Well, are you sure you want to have a flying partner?
Something like that.
